name: Out Of Controls (scriptrwolf)
description:
This game was created for the GMTK 2020 game jam.

Theme: Out Of Control.

Out Of Controls is a dodging game where the controls change direction every wave!

Use WASD keys to move, controls are "out of control" and changes direction every wave.  Click on HELP button in the menu for how to play.

I had some problems with the build of the game, so if the movement is super weird or extremely slow or fast or if it seems more buggy than it should be, it was probably due to the build.

ENJOY!
